title: Wind Power Cannibalization in Europe
description: Computational scripts for analyzing wind power cannibalization effects in European electricity markets. This repository contains the code accompanying the research article on wind power cannibalization in Europe.

creators.name: Bibi, Amna
creators.affiliation: University of Bremen; Pakistan Meteorological Department
